amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to add the bipartisan SAFE Banking Act which allows state-legal cannabis businesses to access the banking system and help improve public safety by reducing the amount of cash at these businesses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perlmutter amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perlmutter amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Perlmutter amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Perlmutter.
